headline: Kroger (NYSE:KR) Expands Plant-Based Offerings With Beyond Chicken Launch At 1,900 Stores
summary: Kroger (NYSE:KR) experienced a significant price move of 18% over the last quarter. This period saw dynamic events, including the national rollout of Beyond Meat's Beyond Chicken at over 1,900 Kroger stores, which aligns with the increasing consumer demand for plant-based alternatives. Meanwhile, the company announced robust buyback activities and strategic executive changes following the resignation of CEO Rodney McMullen. These factors likely contributed to the positive market sentiment...
